text:
Beverly Wilshire, Beverly Hills launches ‘Suite Hotel California Package’ Published on : Thursday, July 16, 2015
Beverly Wilshire, A Four Seasons Hotel is rolling out the red carpet for guests this fall with the Suite Hotel California Package, a two-night stay (or longer) in a luxurious suite coupled with a stylishly authentic experience available exclusively in Beverly Hills.
Beverly Hills is place of reinvention – where stars are born, and made. Rodeo Drive’s top stylist Nicole Pollard and her LalaLuxe team will offer a once-in-a-lifetime private shopping experience where guests will become the best version of themselves. The LaLaLuxe team will extend their exclusive relationships with luxury boutiques, fashion designers and VIP service providers on Rodeo Drive to take care of every shopping wish – from a wardrobe update complete with the fall season’s must-have items to sourcing hard-to-find luxury items such as rare watches and handbags.
Post-shopping, guests can retire to their suite and enjoy myriad amenities including Rodeo Drive cupcakes and Champagne prepared by Pastry Chef Stephen Sullivan, complimentary premium internet, parking, laundry and unlimited in-suite entertainment.
Rooms with a view, the suites are located in two buildings: the 10-storey Wilshire Wing overlooking the fashionable corner of Wilshire Boulevard and Rodeo Drive, and the 14-storey Beverly Wing overlooking the lush residential area of Beverly Hills. With a choice of 137 different suites – ranging from a One-Bedroom Suite with a view of Rodeo Drive to elite Penthouse and Presidential accommodations – guests have a variety of spacious accommodations to choose from. The generously proportioned one and two-bedroom layouts offer comfortable residential décor, and in some cases furnished balconies and private-floor access.
The Suite Hotel California Experience is available from September 1 through November 30, 2015 and is part of the Suite Hotel California Coastal Tour with Four Seasons – a select grouping of the brand’s seven luxurious properties situated across famed locations in the Golden State. Four Seasons hotels in California are teaming up to bring guests the ultimate road-trip featuring exclusive local experiences that highlight the best of California’s coastal destinations where Four Seasons calls home.
Source:-Four Seasons Hotel
